CustomField.formula: IF( IF( (MONTH( Today() ) >= 6 && MONTH( Today() ) <= 12), ((YEAR( Today() )+ 1)), ((YEAR( Today() )) ) ) = IF( ( MONTH( ucinn_ascendv2__Expected_Close_Date__c ) >= 6 && MONTH( ucinn_ascendv2__Expected_Close_Date__c ) <= 12 ), ((YEAR( ucinn_ascendv2__Expected_Close_Date__c )+ 1)), ((YEAR( ucinn_ascendv2__Expected_Close_Date__c ))) ), TRUE, FALSE )
